analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa
dhamma paccanīya
hetu duke ācaya gāmattika ādi
na hetum na ācaya gāmim dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
na hetum na apacaya gāmim dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava

original: Nahetuṁ nanevaācayagāmiṁ nāpacayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
analyzed: na hetum na na iva ācaya gāmim na apacaya gāmim dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava vipākam natthi

na hetum na micchatta niyatam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
